name: Trimmer - Improved Actuators
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ This Trimmer will heal your pet for up to 6k of HP and will give an additional boost to damage for 600 secs. It will lock your Mechanical Engineering skill for 60 minutes. #L "Trimmer Casing" "263824" #L "Smelly Liquid" "253173" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Smelly Liquid + Trimmer Casing = #L "Trimmer - Improve Actuators" "253189" Skills: | trimmer casing needs to be 90% of the Smelly Liquid |
